casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

May 3, 2005

[Cite as 05/03/2005 Case Announcements, 2005-Ohio-2106.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2001-0871. State v. Ahmed.

Belmont C.P. No. 99-CR-192. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas for Belmont County. Upon consideration of appellant’s amended pro se motion to allow supplemental briefing as of right in this case,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and hereby is, denied.
